description: A high-level Go module for interacting with the GitHub API

highlights.description: New `profile` package for comprehensive GitHub user contribution statistics
New `gogithub` CLI tool with progress bars and multiple output formats
Contributor statistics wrapper in `repo` package with 202 Accepted retry handling
Integration tests that run against real GitHub API when token is available

added.description: New `profile` package for user contribution statistics aggregation
`profile.GetUserProfile()` - fetch comprehensive profile stats from multiple API sources
`profile.UserProfile` type with commits, PRs, issues, reviews, repos, additions/deletions
`profile.ContributionCalendar` type with weekly/daily grid and streak tracking
`profile.ActivityTimeline` type with monthly activity breakdown
`profile.ProgressInfo` type for stage-based progress reporting
Calendar streak calculations: `LongestStreak()`, `CurrentStreak()`, `DaysWithContributions()`
GitHub-style monthly summaries: `CommitSummary()`, `PRSummary()`, `IssueSummary()`
`repo.ListContributorStats()` - list all contributors for a repository
`repo.GetContributorStats()` - get stats for a specific contributor
`repo.GetContributorSummary()` - get aggregated summary with first/last commit dates
`repo.ContributorSummary` type with TotalCommits, TotalAdditions, TotalDeletions, FirstCommit, LastCommit
Automatic 202 Accepted retry handling with exponential backoff for contributor stats
New `gogithub` CLI tool built with Cobra
`gogithub profile` command for fetching user contribution statistics
`gogithub search-prs` command for searching open PRs by user
CLI progress display with Unicode progress bars and stage indicators
CLI output formats: summary, JSON, raw+aggregate JSON files
CLI can regenerate aggregate from raw file without API calls (`--input` flag)
Integration tests for profile package (8 tests)
Integration tests for repo/contributors (6 tests)
Integration tests automatically skip when GITHUB_TOKEN is not set

Added `docs/guides/profile.md` - comprehensive profile package guide
Added `docs/guides/testing.md` - testing guide with integration test instructions

tests.description: Added unit tests for `profile.UserProfile` (summary, top repos, filtering)
Added unit tests for `profile.ContributionCalendar` (levels, streaks, lookups)

highlights.description: **Breaking**: Upgraded `go-github` from v81 to v82
New `checks` package for GitHub Check Runs API (CI status, waiting for checks)
New `tag` package for Git tag operations (create, list, delete tags)
Extended `pr` package with review and approval functions
Extended `release` package with create/delete operations

breaking.description: Upgraded `github.com/google/go-github` from v81 to v82 - update your imports accordingly

added.description: New `checks` package for GitHub Check Runs API
`checks.ListCheckRuns()` - list check runs for a commit SHA or branch
`checks.ListCheckRunsForPR()` - list check runs for a pull request
`checks.GetChecksStatus()` - get aggregate status (passed/failed/pending counts)
`checks.AllChecksPassed()` - check if all runs completed successfully
`checks.WaitForChecks()` - poll until all checks complete or timeout
`checks.GetCheckRun()` - get a specific check run by ID
`checks.ListCheckSuites()` - list check suites for a commit
`checks.ChecksStatus` type with Total, Passed, Failed, Pending, AllPassed, AnyFailed, AnyPending fields
New `tag` package for Git tag operations
`tag.ListTags()` - list all tags for a repository with pagination
`tag.GetTagSHA()` - get the commit SHA for a tag
`tag.CreateTag()` - create an annotated tag
`tag.CreateLightweightTag()` - create a lightweight tag (reference only)
`tag.DeleteTag()` - delete a tag
`tag.TagExists()` - check if a tag exists
`tag.GetTagNames()` - get just the tag names from a repository
`pr.ApprovePR()` - add an approval review to a pull request
`pr.RequestChangesPR()` - request changes on a pull request
`pr.CommentPR()` - add a comment review to a pull request
`pr.IsMergeable()` - check if a PR can be merged with detailed status
`pr.ListPRReviews()` - list all reviews on a pull request
`pr.MergeableState` type with Mergeable, State, Message fields
`release.CreateRelease()` - create a new release for a repository
`release.CreateReleaseSimple()` - create a release with common options
`release.DeleteRelease()` - delete a release by ID
`release.EditRelease()` - update a release

documentation.description: Added v0.7.0 changelog entry with all new features

Updated README with examples for checks, tag, and release packages

highlights.description: Added `graphql` package for GitHub GraphQL API support with user contribution statistics
Added MkDocs documentation site with Material theme, auto-deployed to GitHub Pages
Two approaches for commit statistics: quick stats (profile view) and detailed stats (additions/deletions)

added.description: New `graphql` package for GitHub GraphQL API
`graphql.NewClient()` and `graphql.NewEnterpriseClient()` for GraphQL client creation
`graphql.GetContributionStats()` for quick contribution statistics (like GitHub profile)
`graphql.GetContributionStatsMultiYear()` for multi-year contribution queries
`graphql.GetCommitStats()` for detailed commit stats with additions/deletions
`graphql.GetCommitStatsByVisibility()` for stats split by public/private repositories
`graphql.Visibility` type with `VisibilityAll`, `VisibilityPublic`, `VisibilityPrivate` constants
`graphql.ContributionStats` type with monthly contribution breakdown
`graphql.CommitStats` type with per-repo and per-month breakdowns including line changes
MkDocs documentation site with Material theme at https://grokify.github.io/gogithub/
Documentation guides for all packages: auth, search, repo, pr, release, graphql, errors
GitHub Actions workflow for automatic documentation deployment to gh-pages

highlights.description: Added `QueryBuilder` for type-safe, fluent query construction
Preserved `Query` map type for flexibility with new GitHub search qualifiers
Removed `NewClientHTTP` - use `search.NewClient(github.NewClient(httpClient))` instead

added.description: `QueryBuilder` type with fluent builder pattern for constructing search queries
`NewQuery()` function to create a new `QueryBuilder`
`QueryBuilder.User()`, `Org()`, `Repo()` methods for scope filtering
`QueryBuilder.State()`, `StateOpen()`, `StateClosed()` methods for state filtering
`QueryBuilder.Is()`, `IsPR()`, `IsIssue()` methods for type filtering
`QueryBuilder.Author()`, `Assignee()`, `Label()`, `Mentions()`, `Involves()` methods
`QueryBuilder.Set(key, value)` escape hatch for any search qualifier
`QueryBuilder.Build()` method returning the underlying `Query` map

highlights.description: Major architecture refactor: reorganized into modular subpackages by operation type
Added comprehensive GitHub API operations for repositories, pull requests, and releases
Maintained backward compatibility with v0.2.x API (deprecated, will be removed in v0.4.0)

added.description: New `errors` package with standard error types (`ErrNotFound`, `ErrPermissionDenied`, `ErrRateLimited`, etc.) and `Translate` function
New `config` package with `Config` struct, `FromEnv`, `FromEnvWithConfig`, GitHub Enterprise support
New `pathutil` package with `Validate`, `Normalize`, `Join`, `Split`, `Dir`, `Base`, `Ext`, `HasPrefix` functions
New `auth` package with `NewGitHubClient`, `GetAuthenticatedUser`, `GetUser` functions
New `search` package with `Client`, `SearchIssues`, `SearchIssuesAll`, `Query` builder, and `Issues` type with table generation
New `repo` package with fork operations (`EnsureFork`, `GetDefaultBranch`)
New `repo` package with branch operations (`CreateBranch`, `GetBranchSHA`, `DeleteBranch`, `BranchExists`)
New `repo` package with commit operations (`CreateCommit`, `ReadLocalFiles`, `FileContent` type)
New `repo` package with listing operations (`ListOrgRepos`, `ListUserRepos`, `GetRepo`, `ParseRepoName`)
New `repo` package with batch operations (`Batch` type for atomic multi-file commits)
New `pr` package with `CreatePR`, `GetPR`, `ListPRs`, `MergePR`, `ClosePR`, `AddPRReviewers`, `ListPRFiles`, `ListPRComments`
New `release` package with `ListReleases`, `ListReleasesSince`, `GetRelease`, `GetLatestRelease`, `GetReleaseByTag`, `ListReleaseAssets`
New `cliutil` package with `GitStatusShortLines`, `GitRmDeletedLines`, `GitRmDeletedFile` helpers
Example command `cmd/searchuserpr` for searching user pull requests

changed.description: Reorganized codebase from flat package structure to modular subpackages by operation type
Root package now provides backward-compatible re-exports delegating to subpackages
